projects.title: Geek Singers website
projects.description: One-page Wordpress for my geek choir.

projects.title: Personal book shelf
projects.description: I love reading and I love numbers so it's always been exciting to me to generate stats on my readings :3. Books infos are gathered using openlibrary's public APIs.

projects.title: DAPY P4: Chess tournament manager
projects.description: Console app for chess tournaments. Add, display and modify players and tournaments in database. Assists user in matching players and keeping track of results.

projects.title: DAPY P6: Just Stream it
projects.description: Front-end HTML/CSS/Javascript project. Reads data from a public API listing movies and displays chosen categories in interactive carousels.

projects.title: DAPY P9: LITReview
projects.description: Django blog app for books and articles reviews. Users can log in, browse their feed, follow other users, ask for and write reviews.

projects.title: DAPY P12: EPIC events
projects.description: Secure RESTful API for EPIC events' CRM. Provides 4 endpoints with different permissions depending on user's team (admin/sales/support).

projects.title: D&D character generator
projects.description: Our current RPG campaign is using Old-School Essentials, and it is EXTREMELY LETHAL. To ease things up for the DM (and sometimes players), I deployed a quick character generator on alwaysdata.

projects.title: Dreamcatcher
projects.description: Visualizer to explore keywords from our dreams. Select a local folder and all files are parsed to look for '#keywords'. Network is generated with visdcc, vizualisation with Plotly Dash.
